title: (x) "Objectiv" logo by Superfamous - Alba {Lex}
content:
[http://www.superfamous.com/empire/docs/cases/img/logoagogo/12.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153436/http:/www.superfamous.com/empire/docs/cases/img/logoagogo/12.gif "http://www.superfamous.com/empire/docs/cases/img/logoagogo/12.gif")

I need a font similar to this with same roundness. Any ideas??

Thanks a bunch!

/Henriko

 [‹ (x) Reiss menswear website face - Bitstream Cooper {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153436/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29691 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Fonts on House M.D. title sequence - Century Gothic, various similar {Stephen, Skylar, Richard Hards} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153436/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29683 "Go to next forum topic")
author: henriko

comments.content: I don’t think it’s based on anything existing, as these shapes are very easy to create from scratch, but it does remind me of _beta\_lounge_ by [beta\_bi](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153436/http:/beta-bi.de/start.html) (go to _vermischtes \> fontlabor \> 01)_.

Thanks Bald!

Well for someone it’s easy to create from scratch... I’m having hardtimes here :(

Do you perhaps have a link to a tutorial on that subject? Is it constructed with a grid behind?

Beta\_lounge is a hit!

Thanks to Stephen also.

I think this is Alba from Fontalicious - it’s not on the site Yves mentioned for some reason, but you can find it on [dafont](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153436/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=alba&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=objectiv&nb_ppp=10&classt=alpha).

- Lex

It _is_ Alba?! I couldn’t find it on the Font Bros site, and when I wanted to check Dafont the site was down.

Good show as always, Lex. ;^)
